# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be invaluable to you. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity with an offer of $200 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you're interested in making this investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
